summary: Adds nearly 500 spells to the game world. All balanced, leveled and lore-friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Adds nearly 500 spells to the game world. All balanced, leveled and lore-friendly.

This projects overdoses on the amount of Spells, Powers, Abilities and shouts the player can use at their disposal. 

All of them are different in a way but have all been carefully balanced and sorted out in Leveled lists.
Even npcs can use these spells.
author: SpiderAkiraC
